text: Love Hard is a 2021 American romantic comedy movie directed by Hernán Jiménez. It stars Nina Dobrev, Jimmy O. Yang, Darren Barnet, Matty Finochio, James Saito and Harry Shum Jr.. It is about a young woman who travels to her online crush's hometown in Lake Placid, New York for Christmas, but discovers she's been lied to about her crush's identity. ==References== Category:2021 comedy movies Category:2021 romance movies Category:2020s romantic comedy movies Category:Netflix movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Christmas movies
title: Love Hard (movie)
